TopicTitle: Made Kerbin Teeny-tiny-cutesy-wootesy. Seriously it's small.

Articles.Content:
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/UN4zO)

I made Kerbin 1/100 of the stock scale for fun and profit. No I'm not releasing it. Yes it's buggy as hell. Listen to this while viewing: 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NO6i5PIR_R8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MJ5kmrRG-mw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 
Heck, just go play this game when you're done with KSP for the day: [http://outerwilds.com/about/](http://outerwilds.com/about/)

Anyway, I've been trying to get this to work nicely, but when I later tried flattening the ground in the config and launched a ship, I just got a Hell Kraken. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Holy tiny planet, Batman!

Some of those pictures are starting to look micro rather than macroscopic... looks sweet!

A few months ago, I quipped:

> 
> I wonder how small one could make it (Kerbin) with the game still being playable? *(not including balance, of course it's going to be imbalanced as hail)*
> 1%?
> 
> 0.1%?
> 
> What's the "you can make a rocket that's the size of the planet if you try hard enough" limit?
> 
> ***This begs further research!***

*..And someone makes it. This community.*

Have my rep, good sir.

> 
> A few months ago, I quipped:
> *..And someone makes it. This community.*
> 
> Have my rep, good sir.

It was Gregroxx who made that other config too, wonder how long til 0.1% scale...

> 
> Did you try multiple launches, and have them all get the Kraken, also what's gilly like ?

I only did Kerbin, Mun, and Minmus, but doing the math, Gilly would be small enough to hug. (About 16 m across)

And Hell kraken happens eventually every time. Next time I tried it, I launched fine, but hell kraken'd during climb to orbit. I never hell krakened when I played with EVA Kerbanauts though.
